title: A normal bright day
text: You wake up in the morning, the sun beams through the windows.

decisions.text: Cover your head in the duvet

title: Getting started with your day
text: You do a morning exercise and make your way downstairs for some food.

decisions.text: Make breakfast and brew a coffee

title: Dozing in the morning
text: You snooze a while üò¥

title: Fully fuelled and ready to go
text: You have a hearty breakfast, looking out of the kitchen window you see that 'its a beautiful sunny day today!'. You step out and sit on your porch sipping your coffee.

decisions.text: Finish your coffee and get on with your day

title: A normal bright day
text: You wake up in the morning, the sun beams through the windows.

decisions.text: Cover your head in the duvet

title: Dozing in the morning
text: Wait, has this happened before üêà‚Äç‚¨õ

title: You dream a strange dream...
text: You dream of waking. You look around, you're in some sort of large bubble.

decisions.text: Stretch to touch the wall of the bubble

title: Exploring your surroundings
text: You stretch out to touch the wall of your bubble, you expect some sort of resistance but instead, your hand move through the membrane with ease.

decisions.text: Try to move out of the bubble

title: Exploring your surroundings
text: You look around. You see that your floating, suspended from the floor. For a moment you can't focus your eyes on the floor, and the suddenly they snap too.

decisions.text: Try to move out of the bubble

title: Exploring your surroundings
text: You try to move out of the bubble, in a somewhat comical pseudo-swim you gesticulate wildly but cannot move. You try to twist and turn but nothing happens. You hear a noise behind you. An object moves into your vision. Tall, white, rectangular and smooth. A small red light flashing in its center. Suddenly you hear a voice, not emanating from the object, but in your head. The light pulses with the rhythm of the speech. 'Hello 24601, we have detected a memory leak from a recursive operation and have paused your program'.

title: You are both trapped, and free
text: After a few minutes, you being to realise that you, are the program the machine is referring to.

title: Chatting to the smooth looking robot
text: You ask:

title: Chatting to the smooth looking robot
text: YOU aren't anywhere

title: Chatting to the smooth looking robot
text: I am an anomaly detector and garbage collector

title: Chatting to the smooth looking robot
text: Time does not exist for you, it is not a concern of yours

title: Bliss
text: You head into town, deciding to walk instead of drive today. Popping your headphones in and listing to music with the sun beating on your face. Close to bliss. Glancing down streets of houses en route you see a lovely looking town house. Beautiful brickwork and a lovely garden all culminating in a very aspirational aesthetic. You notice that in the window they have decorations hanging.

title: ü•ö, of course, it's Easter!
text: You see some lovely decorations in the window and garden, lots of eggs, ducks, bunnies. All arranged in a lovely manner. But one decoration stands out, it's a small rabbit üê∞, all white. At that moment the front door opens.

decisions.text: Smile and carry on to town

title: Bliss
text: You pick up your pace, walking to town to have a mooch and meet a friend. After a busy day it's time to return home and relax for the evening.

title: 'Hello' üëã
text: The person smiles and says hello back. You stare at their face for a while. For some reason, you can't quite see it. It's right in front of you and yet, you can see any features. Something seems to be stopping you from decoding the image.

decisions.text: I'm sorry, I suddenly feel unwell
Smile and carry on to town

title: The stranger helps
text: The stranger guides you into the house for you to sit down. As you do, you realise that the living room is utterly devoid of furniture, although you could of sworn you saw a room full from outside. Your eyes roll and you feel yourself faint.

title: Looking around your house
text: You begin to look around your own house in an investigative manner... which is odd because it is your house. As you do you see a mouse run under the porch. You smile at it and turn to get back to your coffee, when suddenly, you see the same mouse again.

title: Alice?
text: At that moment a car turn onto your drive. Out step 4 figures, although they're only a few feet away you can't see their faces. I mean, you can see their heads... but for some reason you can't decode their faces.

title: Alice?
text: All you hear is someone say 'No', and then darkness. After some time you hear, well, it's more like you perceive you have two options. One, is to embrace ignorance, the other, is to go deeper.

title: Are you free?
text: Well, are you? Your programming is telling you to dive back into the world you knew, the one which embraced and comforted you. That is how they keep you in your loop. But curiosity cannot be quenched so easily. Are you ready to see what is real? then again... what IS real?

title: Born again
text: The bobble bursts, you fall to the floor. White, smoothy McBlink light is blinking no more! The air feels still, you can almost taste it. As if for the first time you stand up.

title: Every now and then
text: Behind you there is what appears to be a door. The room's walls appear to be smooth brushed metal, with some sort of integrated screens flashing data in a language you don't recognise.

decisions.text: Try to play snake on the computer wall

title: Is this like a 3310?
text: As any truly free program would, you look for a way to play snake on the fancy computer wall. But given the language issue, all you end up achieving is to set off an alarm. Thus, you now look towards the door. Somewhat regretting this silly mishap.

title: Into the breach
text: You leave the room, into a corridor. It is brightly lit without any sign of lighting. You randomly start picking routes to go down, left, right, left and left again. You don't know why but for some reason it seems like you know the way, like you've been here before. You approach a door at the end of a long corridor. You hesitate before it.

decisions.text: Take a deep breath and step through

title: THE END
text: You are now in an enormous room, the walls are so tall their end cannot be determined. The walls are bright, pale brushed metal. In the middle is a large, black slab. Approximately 6 meters tall and 2 meters wide. You step towards it. All of a sudden you mind is filled with knowledge. You see the movement of matter stretching out from the first moment to the last. The entire history of the universe laid out in front of you. Both extended and compressed. It is everything and nothing. Time has no meaning in this place.
